eewa oba sawistharawa karunu ekin eka gena wartha karanneda natha.(ee oba eewa asin nudutu nisa da wiya haka, nodani)oba kisiyam hethuwak nisa ewani da noliyuwath oba sihalekuwa sita demalun gana wadi sanwedibhawayen liyannak men uthure siduwu ewani siddhin uthure sita daka wartha kala ho karana lada ekadu demala jathikayaku ho nidasunak se penwanna.ese liyu yamak sinhala jathikayekuta piliganwu awasthawak udaharana kota dakwiya hakinam eya parithoshithayak lesinda salakami.
esema pasal kalayen pasuwa pasal daruwange aarakshawa sambandhayen mapiyan da wagakimen katayuthu kala yuthu bawa da adhyapana amathyawaraya sihipath kala.'

sayitam wirodhi udghoshana nisa 2016 sita wishwa widyalawala waidya adhyapanaya sampurnayenma ana hita thibuni. 2016 waidya widyawa hadarimata sudusukam labu sisun thawamath adhyayana katayuthu aarambha kara nathi thathwayak yatathe 2017 usas pela samath wena sisunda waidya pita walata athuluwimata balaporoththuwen siti.
me mada guliyata amudrawya sapaya aththe amathya mangala samarawira mahathata hithathi madhyawedin dedenaku bawata da owuhu chodana ella karathi.

me korona samaye athyawashya drawya, bhanda ha sewa bedaharima wagema salasiya yuthuma ayata subasadhanaya sapayima saha dimana labadime di muhuna demin sitina arbudaya wanahi gamata eekabaddha yanthranayak wyuhayak nathikame prathi wipaka ya.
me ratekamata ari athi katawal ganana dawasin dawasa ihala yayi.

api danne naha kawrun ekathu wi mewa karanawada kiyala.sagala rathnayaka mahatha- methumanlama kiwwa el ti ti ee yata hisa usawanna denne naha kiya.ehema kiyanawanam usawiyata karunu wartha kara nithipathi upades anuwa katayuthu karannarawi karunanayaka- methana manthriwarun web adawi pawathwagena yanawa.

kese wethath nawa rajaya balayata pathwimen pasu nawatha kamituwak pathkara kottasa nirnaya kirime katayuthu aarambha kala bawa pawasu janadhipathithuma ee pilibadawada kothek wiwechana ella wuwath rate siduwiya yuthu deshapalana saha samaja pa්rathisanskarana wenuwen eya athyawashya mularambhayak bawa thama salakana bawada pa්rakasha kaleya.ratath, samajayath wenuwen kalayuthu pariwarthanayanhi mul aarambhayak lesa thama eya salakana bawada pa්rakasha kaleya.1978 wyawasthawen athiwu manapa chanda ka්ramaya thulin pakshawala deshapalana pa්rathipaththi saha darshana yatapathwi pudgalayin ismathu wima siduwu bawa da mehidi pa්rakasha kala janadhipathithuma nawa palath palana mathiwarana ka්ramaya saha kottasa chanda ka්ramaya me rate janathawage jayaga්rahanayak bawa da kiya sitiyeya.
namuth adawanawita sabaragamuwa sarasawiya walapallata genayanne akaryakshama paripalanaya saha eeta ihala sita anadena sudubanda mahatha athulu pirisaya.
mana wu labimak ma yi!
